page.title: 19TRANSPORT AROUND MYDDLE
page.content: {THE LOWER ROAD The{Lower Road}has little{traffic,cars {and motorbikes}are most common and quite a lot of{push bikes}go down there.There is no speed limit and there could be a accident.A lot of people walk down the Lower Road.Most of the traffic down the Lower Road is slow but occasionally you get the odd maniac.Hardly any big things like lorries go down there. {THE SPEED LIMIT IN MYDDLE There is no speed limit in Myddle. Most of the traffic goes at about 50 mph.There should be a speed limit of about 40mph from the top of Myddle hill to the church.There should be a lay_by near the school so that cars and lorries can park off the road which is quite narrow.
